subject: Re: problems with swing interface
msgSnippet: ... Remove the need for user input . Test should be completely automated... no human intervention other than getting them started. Dave
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, salil khanwalkar <k_salil@y...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I am using the batch interface to run my tests. In main() i am
> accepting input from the user, it works fine. When i execute the
> tests from the swing interface , it does not accept user input and so
> all my tests give errors.
>
> Please somebody suggest a solution.

Remove the need for "user input".

Test should be completely automated... no human intervention other
than getting them started.

Dave
